Squidy
76 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
21.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 janvier 2022
If you enjoyed the first game, you'll probably also enjoy this one. It's mostly more of the same. I will say that the game shifted upgrades away from double jumps and movement speed ups to things like throwable weapon range increases. It creates a tighter, more predictable environment to help make puzzles more interesting and harder to cheese, but it comes at the cost of the sheer joy of movement that the last game had. Also, the move away from combat, while generally a good idea, means that the vast majority of the upgrades in the game feel underwhelming. You really don't need the health and combat upgrades and that's 99% of what you'll get. Overall I liked the first game more, but this was still an enjoyable experience. I probably won't 100% it like I did with the last one though.

Se siete curiosi di vedere come si presenta nel suo inizio..

ItsBird
275 produits enregistrés
1
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
118.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 janvier 2022
Produit reçu gratuitement

Another fantastic game in the Supraland series, this time a full sequel. Six Inches Under (SIU) is a continuously evolving experience as you learn and gain abilities for solving puzzles, exploring the world and destroying the monsters.

With its beautiful stylised graphics, light hearted comic nature, tight controls and delightful world SIU more than matches Supraland.

Six Inches Under has:
* Huge variety of physics puzzles
* Metroidvania style collection and exploration
* It's own unique platforming and traversal
* A light but fun story to keep you moving
* A fresh take on combat that even hooks into the puzzles
* A new setting and improved graphics

Anyone who has enjoyed puzzle games like Portal and The Talos Principle will love the incredible variety of physics based puzzles.

If you've played Supraland 1 this game is a great sequel, adding plenty of new elements mixed in with the old. If you haven't, SIU does a great job of smoothly introducing each element making it just as accessible as the first.

I was invited to play the beta a week before launch (hence getting the game for free) and loved it, spending 20-30 hours completing the game and getting every collectible and achievement, and I'm already starting a second play through.

Highly recommended. 10/10

371 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile

0
Recommandé
6.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 janvier 2022
Thumbs up, BUT...

So I LOVED the first Supraland and the DLC. Completed both of them 100% just because of the great puzzles and the interesting enviroments and tools.

But this game was really lackluster for me. It felt rushed? Like it was missing a lot. I was expecting a big adventure with lots of different areas like the first Supraland but this one didn't have that. Maybe I set my expectations too high?

I still like the game and that is why I give it a thumbs up. But if you played the first Supraland and want another adventure just like that, then I wouldn't recommend buying this for the full price. I'd rather recommend buying it on sale.

It's just more Supraland. Feels more like a DLC than a standalone game/sequel. It's sad cause I really love Supraland but this game was just missing abilities and lacked anything original and new. It had some new elements but very few.

I really hope the future games don't feel rushed like this one and has so much just, missing.

411191114

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
12.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 mars 2023
It is not different enough from Supraland which makes its (their) shortcoming more obvious/painful. For example, most of the time the puzzle is simply finding this one block of wood through a small window --- having open world certainly hurt more in this aspect since the search space is larger. If you have played Supraland, this is passable in my opinion.

Re developer response: If you need example, look here. This is a mandatory puzzle to complete to progress the main story.
https://www.neoseeker.com/supraland-six-inches-under/Factory_Town
https://cdn.staticneo.com/ew/thumb/7/7a/Supraland_Pulltothewood.jpg/662px-Supraland_Pulltothewood.jpg

I appreciate your time nitpicking my review. I don't mean *almost every* puzzle is literally this but there are a good portion of puzzles *similar* to these. (A lot of the optional chests are even more ridiculous.)

Searching every inch of the map is not puzzle solving. I guess searching would have been more fun if the aesthetics are more interesting, e.g. it's very different from Supraland. This is why I probably wouldn't bother with the post game. For main story, puzzles like these should be avoided; and making these kind of optional puzzles for post-game just seems like a lazy attempt to generate "content".

Recommandé
31.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 janvier 2022
Excellent puzzle Metroidvania. Not quite as good as the original Supraland, but still 100% worth playing.

The original Supraland heavily rewarded exploration. Any time you explored an area that looked like maybe you weren't supposed to get there, you'd find another chest. In Supraland 6" Under, there's still plenty of hidden chests, but they've traded the exploration focus for hiding things closer to the main path.

Don't get me wrong: some of these are hidden very cleverly. But I miss the way the chests were hidden in the original Supraland. I also felt like WAY too many of the chests in 6" Under were just more coins.

Évaluation publiée le 15 janvier 2022
I was a massive fan or the first game so this was a must-buy for me, not even 2 hours in and I'm not disappointed, all the little details and amusing meta-dialogue from the first game are back, the puzzles are fun and the exploration is just as rewarding.

If you like the first one then this is a much buy, apparently it's shorter which has been offset by a lower price, you really can't go wrong.

Évaluation publiée le 29 janvier 2022
If you're here, you've already played Supraland. If you haven't, buy that instead.

This is a fine game, but not quite up to the standards set by Supraland.

Six Inches Under is a little short for the opening price--completed the game in about 7 hours for $16. I expect 1 hour per dollar spent, so the value isn't what I hope for when I buy games.

Get it on sale and it's worth it. Less than Supraland, but still worth a play.

0
Non recommandé
12.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 janvier 2022
Overall Supraland has been a positive experience, but I can't recommend it because whenever a power-up appears on my screen my game slows down to around 20 fps. I also think this game's progression systems need a revamp. Your Max possible HP should not be 30, we really do not need that much health. There are a couple power ups that make me feel dread when I find, Throw distance, Throw Penetration, Coins, and Max HP. Coins don't feel thought out and you're going to have so many extra by the end of the game, I suggest removing the power ups I mentioned and replacing them with more meaningful currency for buying the best powerups, removing them entirely, or combining them into more significant power-ups. Another suggestion I have is making a secret which is literally just a test of your DPS, if you have all the damage items in the game you can pass it by holding left click, my point is these power-ups have to have meaning besides just being "more power" or "more money"

DUBRBUEHRNISNKN G
276 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
41.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 novembre 2022
Excellent game, nearly as good as its predecessor.

The obvious ebb is that, being underground, we lose the awesomeness of the landscape, the titanic kid, the giant leaps from zone to zone, the super-jumps of the end game, that sort of things.
There is one giant leap across the world, at some point, through beautifully aligned holes and crevices, and it's terrific, and it makes you want to replay the first game.

On the plus side, the main flaw of the original is gone: Mobs don't respawn any more.
As a substantial bonus, mobs have diversified, are not ubiquitous but are confined to certain areas, and have become integrated into puzzles.
In essence, a chore has been stripped out, and replaced with something rather amusing.

The classic (and dreaded) 3 stages boss fight is also done intelligently: You can take all the time you want between each stage.
Perfect treatment of the most exhausted trope in gaming, making it palatable again.
Really appreciated.

Abundant puzzles in an extensive range of difficulty; expected, and delivered.
A couple of solutions made me laugh.
A couple others I consider badly designed.
in particular the last chest, which is out of range of the detector, defeating the purpose of said detector.
I only know because I checked the forums because I thought my game had a bug; one giant sign of a design flaw is the need to quit a game to find information.
I don't mind such a small flaw, personally; however, whoever is compelled to collect 100% participation trophies is going to suffer, as the chest is virtually impossible to reach. I would mind that it contains my favourite upgrade, except that it comes far too late anyway.

No sequel fatigue for me; thoroughly enjoyed.

JaysFirstDay TTV
58 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Non recommandé
18.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 septembre 2023
I'm still gonna try to finish it, but it's pants compared to the first two. Puzzles just aren't as good, and the rewards are almost always pointless amounts of coins or critical hit upgrades, in a game where coins are worthless and combat is almost nonexistent. In the first two games, getting coins to buy upgrades was a pivotal part of solving many puzzles, but that just isn't the case here, aside from the first two pickaxe upgrades, I suppose.

The general themes are political and offputting. Negative against capitalism, but in a "you agree with us, right?" way, not a clever or nuanced way. In the end, everyone turns into gay communists or something I guess. There's also a gay couple in this children's themed game, and possibly a polyamorous group as well. Everyone's entitled to their own opinions and viewpoints, but if you're going to put these things at the forefront of a game, at least present it in an entertaining or clever way.

One thing that stood out to me as a really missed opportunity was when you enter the Baron's house to fix the toilet, and there's no toilet. There's a mild running gag involving all the toilets being poop buckets, and it would have been a good joke to make the baron's toilet a poop bucket, albeit maybe a golden one. And the gag being why would a plumber need to fix a bucket?

くまなく探索しないと探せないものもあります　ヒントになるかもですが、人の話を聞きながらアイテムを上手に使いこなす感じでやっていきます アイテムは近くにあるので難しく考えすぎずにやっていくのがコツです


しかも安いのにこんなボリュームでいいの？ってな感じで購入しても損はしません　かなり気に入ってます

現在はまりすぎて何時間もやっています　
前半エンドロールがありますが実はココからが本番です！　またこれが難しい
現在９９％まで進んでいます　残りはアップグレード１つだけ(現在25/26)

windows11対応しています
 
yuuka
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
9.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 janvier 2022
While I liked foundations for the game, I can't recommend it unless a lot is reworked and polished.

Biggest and the worst offender: The non-linear progression with puzzles that requires powerups makes you wonder if you just don't understand something or if it something you are not even supposed to do yet. Basically all of the tools you get could have been given to you in the first (half an) hour but tools teleportation gun weren't even properly utilized in the game.

Then we get to the second point: A lot of the content is optional. That puzzle you struggled to understand? Most likely optional, gives you some coins which you already had too much of that you don't even know what to do with them. I had ~50% completion at the end of the game and now I am not sure if it is all chests or if there are actual puzzles left to be done.

The coins, shop, chests, upgrades, hidden goodies (or the lack of, actually) are all basically a joke as you will swim in coins quite fast and have every single upgrade you can have. The overwhelming abundance of "secret" chests makes them pretty much worthless and finding them gives you no satisfaction at all. Removing most of the chests and the shop completely would make the game more interesting as you would get the upgrades from puzzles/secrets instead of buying.

Upgrading weapons makes the combat just flat out awful. The enemies are complete joke to begin with and with insane attack speed even the last boss was a joke, it felt like they were slapped on the game after designing it. I died way more often by slipping into lava as the game is really laggy.

... Like really laggy. Just spam switching your weapons slows it down to 10-20 fps at worst. I wouldn't even mind the poor performance *that* much if it was at least consistent but the heavy (micro)stuttering with fps jumping around between 10 and 150 makes it quite awful experience.

The good parts? A lot of the "mandatory" puzzles were nice as those were actually decipherable with the tools you had at that point. The areas are quite well defined and you don't need to transfer items back and forth. But the bad part is that you don't know in advance if that is mandatory puzzle or not, or sometimes if you even finished it as intended. There are some info radios that tells me if I can complete something or not but those mostly felt insulting and were not even consistently placed around the world.

I could potentially see myself loving this game but getting it fixed is futile hope. Not that it is impossible task but I doubt it will go back on the designing table as it has already been released. Even smaller enhancements like the map telling me which zones I have finished or where there are puzzles left would make me come back and clear it, but right now it is done and dealt with.
 
esha

It gets better.

I understand the message of the game about capitalism, but I wish people were more unionized in the game instead of blaming each other for the faults of capitalism (red vs blue vs grey). If capitalists keep us divided, they will get away with anything they want. China is no better. If we want to change where the world is going, we have to bring everyone together, make it a war on class (rich vs poor) vs each other.


This game got more soy in it than soybeans grown in California using manure pulled straight from a cow's azzzhole and put straight into a $13 Starbucks latte with warm sheet stains all over the cup and the baristas hands. Getting stuck in a McDonald's ball pit playground while looking for your lost chicken nuggets is more fun than doing these puzzles. Where is the music after I kill the monsters? Game lags. I liked the first one more. F Jeff Bezos and his liberal left Washing post newspaper no, F Turnip. There we go. F Turnip. Yeah. Back to buying random sheeet on Amazon and posting F Bezos on my twitter page. Vote Palpatine 2024 no matter who. This game made a difference for who I vote for Deeez Nutzz 2024.

rotes_Wiesel
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
41.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 décembre 2023
作為第一代的續作，大幅提升解謎程度
_______________
遊戲分成三個階段

第一階段
你的腦袋要足夠靈活，不然很容易卡住
基本上直接通關
ps 我他媽玩了30hr，才想到藍色感應卡

第二階段
相對第一段要輕鬆多 (都在同一個區域)
主要靠彈跳，就過了
ps 我他媽玩了26hr，才拿到探測器
(我是靠彈跳加換位槍)

最後階段
去之前先收集六個骨頭 (不然將盃會差一個)
沒什麼困難

總結
跟第一代比，感覺沒那麼爽
一開始以為拿到五連跳，想說會有些難度 (只是擺好看的)
當我離成功只剩一個寶箱，我硬生生找了四個小時 (你 沒 看 錯)
千萬不要像我這麼頭鐵，全都靠自己 (你真的會瘋掉)

給那些找不到最後一個寶箱，它在你永遠不 可 能發現的地方 (last chest)
在第二階段，巨大桶子旁邊石磚的另外一邊 ( 超 級 困 難)

ps 我的金幣最後剩 458枚 ( 誰 能 超 越 我 !!!!! )

15.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 décembre 2023
Une suite digne de ce nom. On sent que c'était pensé comme un DLC car on a une continuité parfaite (les qualités et les défauts sont les mêmes, le plaisir de jeu également, on est vraiment pas perdus), et en même temps on ressent un renouveau dans l'histoire (et les clins d’œil font toujours plaisir), dans le gameplay (nouvelles armes, nouvelles façon d'utiliser les anciennes...) et dans le game design. Une suite parfaite, en soi. Je recommande vivement, surtout si vous avez aimé le premier !

Hladych
281 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
15.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 décembre 2023
耗时15小时，剧情通关+全成就，相比于第一部来说剧情相对有些短，而且内容并没有很丰富，武器外观以及功能可能多了一些，但本质也只是第一部的道具，对于玩过第一部+DLC的玩家来说相对缺乏新意，宝箱也相对第一部容易找到许多，可能是因为没有“幸福”这个强化吧。
正如我购买前看到的一个评论一样，如果第一部是100分，那么第二部可以给70~80分，第一部的DLC则是40~50分。我是第一部全成就+第二部全成就，唯独DLC我甚至都没有打完，如果有第三部的话，我希望可以出一些新的“神器”，这几个紫、蓝、绿的功能神器都被用烂了，已经没有任何的解密可言，第一部之所以好玩，那是因为之前没有接触过，所有的神器都是全新的神器，对于某些解密需要运用哪些神器是需要相对思考的，但第二部对于已经通关过第一部的玩家来说，某些地方该用哪些神器干些什么都已经很明朗了，当然，总体玩下来感觉还是很好玩的，虽然没有全新的神器，但是拥有全新的地图以及一些新能力，并且融入了一些MC我的世界的一些元素非常有趣，是一个对得起价格以及对得起期待的游戏，对于玩过第一部或者没接触过supraland的玩家都是一部非常值得一玩的游戏。
 
信赖O0O0

Arttyuhtpy
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
16.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 novembre 2023
Highly recommend to Metroidvania/Puzzle-game enjoyers and especially to those who've played the first game.

Six inches was a bit shorter than I was expecting, but the puzzles were that much sweeter.
Both new and returning abilities were used in various and creative ways.
Level design wasn't my favorite aesthetically speaking, but it served its purpose.

Overall a great entry to the franchise :)
 
Unari
74 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
13.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 novembre 2023
После некоторых ожиданий, она вышла. Достойное продолжение прошлой игры, в этой игре даже пересекаются сюжеты, тоесть происходят в одной время, supraland crush и эта игра. Хоть у меня ПК не тянул игру, завлекла на долго, спасибо ей, это были лучшие 13 часов в жизни + часы в прошлой игре (на данный момент). Так скоро ещё и supraworld будет, её вообще хотели выпустить ещё летом 2022, но они решили повременить, и я думаю молодцы что так сделали. Поменяли концепт, добавили сюжет, графику притягивающая в игру, и тот самый игридиент который я не знаю, но из-за него игра становится лучшей! Наверное любовь и независимость разработчиков, и не убивание игр ради денег. И конечно же юмор с духом исследование. Идеально а не игра. Да наверное покажеться просто вылезал всё, но это реально круто, и я не вижу минусов, если вам не нравится, скорее всего вам просто что-то не нравится то что есть в этой игре что описывал выше.

fischmanchu
333 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
20.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 novembre 2023
Местами игра душноватей и короче первой части, НО очень было весело смотреть на себя из первой игры, очень много веселых моментов. Но однозначно первая часть как по мне лучшая вместе с дополнением.
Хотя должен сказать, что после прохождения игры есть, что исследовать и разработчики подумали о игроках это плюс =) Но минус в том, что ты как бы ограничен в умениях и способностях по сравнению с 1-й частью, где ты мог быстрей бегать выше прыгать и было приятнее исследовать мир. Так что опять повторюсь, в этом плане игра поддушила...
Моё мнение это выглядит просто 2-м дополнением, для 1-й части.
 
БелыйПандаГризли
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
13.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 novembre 2023
Вот так нужно делать сиквелы! Оригинал попал мне в самое сердечко, а после прохождения Six Inches Under я уже не знаю, какая часть мне нравится больше. Постараюсь ниже перечислить ключевые особенности продолжения.

Во-первых, я рад наличию прямой сюжетной связи с Supraland и DLC Crash.

Во-вторых, очень благодарен за добавление столь необходимой карты, на которой ещё и пометки можно делать.

В-третьих, мир перестал быть открытым в том смысле, что теперь игра проходит под землёй, а значит, в конце искать оставшиеся секреты гораздо проще, так как нет возможности перелезать через стены.

В-четвёртых, игра стала короче, и мне это нравится, потому что контент стал более концентрированным. Пожалуй, в идеале стоило бы выбрать что-то среднее между 30 часами на первую часть и 13 часами на эту.

В-пятых, упор на битвы стал меньше. В первой части они после определённого уровня прокачки больше отвлекали, чем развлекали. Хотя и тут тоже можно было бы поискать золотую середину. Но это уже мелкие придирки.

Суммарно я в восторге и ставлю игре заслуженные 6 дюймов из 6.
 
Zhareg
573 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
17.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 novembre 2023
O jogo tem a mesma mistura perfeita de exploração que seu antecessor, com ainda mais quebra-cabeças e humor, mas com alguns novos recursos interessantes. Eu gostei muito das novas ferramentas para explorar o mundo de maneiras novas. Além disso, o jogo também adiciona novos tipos de inimigos e quebra-cabeças, que ajudam a manter as coisas frescas.

Apesar de alguns problemas no balanceamento do combate, Six Inches Under é um jogo que vale a pena jogar, ainda mais se você gostou do original

kubek.84
16 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
19.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 4 novembre 2023
Tengo los dos juegos al 100% y luego de sufrir para encontrar todos los cofres y mas el ultimo que vaya zona mas j0did4mente random la han puesto que ni el detector mejorado lo llega a escanear de lo lejos que esta, puedo decir que el juego es muy bueno pero que no supera el primero.

La campaña esta entretenida y mola ver como enlaza la campaña de la expansion del primero juego ♥♥♥ el de este, a lo que gameplay se refiere no se va de mucho del primero ♥♥♥ algunos puzles muy Zzzz que de lo aburridos/monótonos que son pues ni te concentras, ♥♥♥ el movimiento en algunas zonas como que han puesto que sea muy tiquis miquis a lo que precisión se refiere, pero ♥♥♥ alguna ideas nuevas combinando ♥♥♥ mecánicas del nuevas pues es entretenido.
Si te quieres hacer el 100% vas a tener que recurrir a las guías porque hay cada cosa mas rebuscada que se te hace muy pesado y aburrido de lo escondidas que están solo para que luego te den un puñado de monedas...

En resumen, si te gusto el primero y su expansión este te va a gustar pero si que notas que es algo inferior el anterior, por lo demás esta okey para pasar un ratillo.

看到有的评论说这是发生在crash之后的内容，实际不然，从本作和crash的联动剧情不难看出这是与crash同时间发生的故事，此时红王子在地表捡垃圾拼火箭，水管工在地下“推翻资本家”。
和开发者所言一样，本作与其说是新作不如说是资料片，除了地图全新以外，道具和解谜思路很大一部分还是延续前作，笑料和各种捏他致敬梗和前作一样多，整体玩法也和前作差不多。继承和改进的内容在高赞评论那里已经说的很详细了。
多加一句吐槽的话:本作的定位其实有点尴尬，很多解谜手法继承前作所以在本作里没有过多提示，以至于玩过前作的人体验本作可能会觉得内容不够新，没玩过前作的人初次遇到本作里的部分谜题可能会无从下手。
 
M默弦M
977 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
27.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 octobre 2023

143 produits enregistrés

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
14.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 septembre 2023
What a waste of time this was... I 100%ed the game because I'm a completionist, but compared to the first one, the quest for completion has absolutely no flavour. This game is extremely linear, you get most of the main power-ups very quickly, rewards feel inconsequential most of the time and you spend the rest of the time wondering why you have so many coins to buy nothing with and so many combat upgrades when there are like 10 fighting sequences in the whole game. It really feels like they pasted a bunch of assets from the first game together quickly to get some more money after its DLC bombed.

jude.steam
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
15.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 septembre 2023
作为Supraland的第二部续作，在玩法不变的基础上以另一种视角为我们讲述了地下的故事。
本座削减了毫无意义的堆怪刷钱等机制，扩充了探索、解谜以及收集要素。
虽然整体地图大小是没有原来大，但是内容丰富程度一点不逊于一代。
对于没玩过一代的玩家也不用担心，因为这是两条不同的故事线，完全可以当做外传性质的补充。

Godly
146 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
8.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 aout 2023
Definitivamente inferior a Supraland, sigue siendo entretenido hacer puzzles y ver como narices llegar a cierto lugar, como en el original. Su mayor problema para mi es que ahora los puzzles son simplemente más difíciles de realizar y las herramientas te permiten hacer cosas menos locas, pasando de ser un sandbox en el que jugar y toquetear cosas, a un juego de rompecabezas al uso donde la solución a los problemas suele ser una que los devs buscan desesperadamente ocultar a tu vista, creando una dificultad que no creo que el venga bien al título. No es que esté mal y tiene cosas pulidas ♥♥♥ respecto al primero, pero si vengo a este saga quiero pasármelo bien, no tener que mirar un video porque ah, las sombrillas no eran interactuables, pero esa en concreto si, y si además la pones en esta posición concreta y no se cae, puedes incluso saltar sobre ella para poder continuar la misión principal. Meh.

OgnjenSmrdezic
57 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
22.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 aout 2023
If you've read the designers post-mortem and you are a fan of Supraland, you might be hesitant to play this game. But don't be! It is an excellent puzzle game and if you loved Supraland you will love Six Inches Under. It may have a couple of rough edges, but it very much captures the fun and feel of the first game, and that is rare.

My small complaints would be that there were a couple puzzles that I felt were "unfair" in that they used un-introduced mechanics. I encountered these puzzles towards the middle of the game. Once I was past those it was pure fun. Interestingly, one of the puzzle the designer claims to love (the infamous blue keycard puzzle), was one of these, and I do not consider that a good puzzle. But everyone will have different opinions!

The takeaway is that if you loved Supraland you will love this and it will scratch the same itch.
 
Probable Cauze
255 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
14.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 aout 2023
Perfection. A tough but fair puzzle adventure that really makes you think about your surroundings more than any puzzle game i can think of. I love the sensible design that eventually spins out of control wildly as new abilities allow you to sequence break, skip or alt solve puzzles. As someone who loves glitch hunting the level designer is always looking out for you. There is hundreds of secrets, shortcuts and hidden areas that reward exploration. I didnt use a guide for the entire game and this is a huge achievement for me as i regularly struggle with puzzle games but something about this series makes me want to keep playing and trying

I really never pay full price for a new game at release (I almost always wait for a sale), but I imagine I will buy Supraworld on day one.

CartNip
319 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
9.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juillet 2023
Supraland是一款十分可爱有趣的类银河战士恶魔城类游戏，同时结合了塞尔达、传送门等经典游戏的玩法元素，带给玩家丰富的游戏体验。
Supraland的玩法是最为精髓的地方，为Portal，Zelda和Metroid的结合体，包含了三类家喻户晓经典游戏的元素，分别为探索，解谜跟战斗。欣慰的是作者并没有将他们直接揉捏在一起，经过精心的设计，它们所占的比例恰到好处（探索>解谜>战斗），比如因为其中一项过于突出而影响了整个游戏体验。
前期没有地图可供玩家浏览，对于路痴玩家来说不够友好（仅针对于路痴玩家）
部分解谜稍微有点难度，提示比较少，对于爱好挑战的玩家来说自然受到喜爱，但对于不擅长解谜的玩家来说，随时可能卡关，有的甚至还会卡很久.（仅针对于解谜苦手，和我这种笨比）
前期缺少传送装置，如果要返回之前的区域基本上需要来回进行跑路，后期虽有弹簧传送功能，不过效率还是远不如前者.（适用大部分玩家）
如果你喜欢小清新的画面，自由无限制的游玩体验，同时对3D没有明显的晕眩症状，那么请允许我在此郑重地向你安利这款你绝对不容错过的第一人称沙盒佳作。

bjkuljis
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
12.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 juillet 2023
Ce spin-off de Supraland, même s'il n'est pas de taille à se mesurer à Portal ni aux meilleurs metroidvania, parvient tout de même à dévoiler petit à petit son potentiel à grand coup d'énigmes malignes, de situations cocasses et d'exploration grisante.

On incarne en effet un bleu qui croisera nombre de personnages hauts en couleur au gré d'une fable teintée d'anti-capitalisme. L'aventure, drôle et légère, réussit à être divertissante de bout en bout grâce notamment à pas mal de références et situations piochées à droite à gauche.

De fait, même si l'élève ne dépasse pas le mètre, il n'a pas à rougir face à la concurrence tant j'ai pris mon pied à fouler ces terres, pourtant situées quelques pouces sous la surface.
 
IDE9CH
1,083 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
21.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 juillet 2023
Отличная головоломка/метроидвания/платформер. Мне не понравилась "первая" часть, дропнул буквально через пару часов. И я с большим скептицизмом запускал "вторую". Не знаю сколько тут от первой игры, но буквально с порога игра уже во многих аспектах лучше предшественника. Нет дурацкой системы "ограниченности" монеток, нет воскрешающихся врагов, бектрэкинга в разы меньше, головоломки логичные, креативные, некоторые способности я вообще впервые вижу в метроидваниях (с одним этим лучом уже в 10 раз больше классных задачек, чем в первой части с кубом). Музыку слышно!!! Да да, в первой части так и не починили музыку за 4 года!!! Вообщем как по мне прям годная работа над "ошибками" была проделана.

Recommandé
20.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 juillet 2023
WOW!😁
Hat wieder genauso viel Spaß gemacht diesen Teil zu Spielen wie auch den Ersten👍👍👍
Die Grafik ist Wunderschön🤩
Die Rätsel sind Perfekt nicht zu schwer oder zu leicht man kommt irgendwann immer drauf👌
Und die Story war Spitze. Auch von der länge her vollkommen okay, da es bei Supraland ja auch eher darum geht gut versteckte Truhen zu finden😎
Auf jeden Fall eine Kaufempfehlung!
Unterstützt die Entwickler damit noch viele solche Spiele kommen😘
Und als ich herausfand das dass Spiel von Deutschen Entwicklern ist war ich noch mehr beeindruckt da es nicht sehr viele gute Deutsche Spiele gibt👍

Die letzte Truhe war echt gemein🥵 das man die nicht mit dem Truhenfinder finden kann😂

Feronagax
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
17.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 juillet 2023
Devam oyununda öncelikle grakfiklerdeki gelişme dikkatimi çekti. Hatta ilk oyundakinin aksine bunda zaman zaman ani fps düşüşleri yaşadığımdan ayarları biraz kısmam gerekti. İlk oyunda bir miktar sorunlu olan ışıklandırma efektleri bu oyunda mükemmel olmuş.

Oynayışa gelecek olursak, ilk oyundaki ana mekanikler korunmuş olsa da köklü bir değişikliğe gidilmiş. Eklenen yeni mekaniklerle artık kırmızı prensi kontrol etmediğimizi her an hissediyoruz.

Kırmızı prens demişken ilk oyun, DLC derken bu oyunda da hikaye adeta ipe dizilmiş gibi ahenk içinde devam etmiş. İlk oyunda kırmızı prensi kontrol ettik, kırmızı ve mavi kasabalar arasındaki rekabeti ve sorunları çözdük. DLC'de yeryüzünün yeniden yaratılışı sürecinde kırmızı prensin evden uzakta, kaza sonucu mahsur kaldığı turuncu kasaba ve çevresinde yaşadığı serüvene dahil olduk. Tabii bu sırada tanımadığımız mavi bir elemana rastlamıştık bir kaç kere. Meğer bu oyuna da o mavi elemanı kontrol ediyormuşuz, aynı sahneleri bir de mavi elemanın gözünden oynayınca benim için çok keyifli bir sürpriz oldu. Önceki oyunlardan karakterler evrenin kendine has mizahıyla bol bol karşımıza çıkıyor, ben şahsen böyle referanslardan çok hoşlanırım. Ayrıca bu oyunda, DLC'de kırmızı prens ile evimize dönmeye uğraşırken gözlemlediğimiz yeryüzündeki yıkım sırasında halkımızın başına gelenlere şahit olurken yer altında mülteci muamelesi gören halkımız için kurtuluş yolu bulmayı amaçlıyoruz. Bu sırada halkın tek umudu benim hissi çok kuvvetli verilmiş, yıkımdan önce ezik görülen tesisatçıdan herkes medet ummaya başlıyor. Velhasıl bu oyun ile yeni bir kahraman yaratmış olduk. Yine bayıldım, yine %100'ledim, ancak ilk oyuna nazaran yaklaşık 4.5 saat daha kısa sürdü, bence makul. Bakalım 3. oyun Supraworld'de bu ikili nasıl maceralar yaşayacak.

Nya
62 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 juin 2023
Jest to prawie prosta aktualizacja od pierwszej, już imponującej. Zagadki i sekrety są całkiem doskonałe, istnieje szybka podróż (oprócz ruchu, który i tak pozwala na szybsze cofanie się), a w pewnym momencie, jeśli jesteś kompletistą, dostępne są narzędzia, które pomogą ci bez konieczności przeszukiwania każdego najmniejszego piksela lub skonsultuj się z przewodnikiem. Istnieje wiele łamigłówek, w których nagle powiesz „Och”, a to może nawet odblokować inne rzeczy, które przegapiłeś lub co do których nie byłeś pewien godzinę temu. Powiedziałbym, że żaden z wymaganych nie jest w ogóle zły ani frustrujący.

Niektóre z opcjonalnych/supertajnych łamigłówek bywają frustrujące i często wymagają wyjątkowej interakcji, którą być może mogłeś przypadkowo odkryć wcześniej, ale nie była do niczego potrzebna lub po prostu nie nadawała się do użytku poza sekretnym obszarem (coś z wyróżnia się tutaj wiązka sił).

Moją jedyną skargą na pierwszą grę była walka – wydawała się przyklejona iw najlepszym razie bezcelowa, ale częściej irytująca. Lubię dobrą grę walki, ale wydawało mi się, że nie musi istnieć. W sequelu jest ogólnie mniej walki i jest ona bardziej ograniczona do aren. To poprawa, ale pod koniec gry nadal czułem, że jedynymi momentami, w których nie bawiłem się, były bity walki. Ponownie nasuwa się pytanie „dlaczego to tutaj jest?”. Istnieje wiele świetnych gier eksploracyjnych / łamigłówek bez walki (przychodzi mi na myśl Sheepo) i chociaż była JEDNA łamigłówka, która wykorzystywała wrogów jako część rozwiązania, to naprawdę nie jest warta zapłaty. Biorąc pod uwagę zmniejszoną częstotliwość (i zwiększoną moc, którą musisz sobie z nimi poradzić) jest to mniej irytujące rzadziej, ale nadal wydaje się bezcelowe, ale z pewnością nie na tyle, aby polecić tę grę.
 
d(0_0)b
573 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
18.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 juin 2023
за: Хороший наследник первой(+длц) части в плане отсылок и головоломок. Сюжетную часть чуть урезали, сделали упор на сложность прохождении головоломок после титров.

против: Сделали очень. много. прозрачных. стен. Если игра позиционирует себя на исследовании мира и бэктрекинге, то в любой момент вы можете добраться куда сможете (читай: хватит фантазии и упорства) и игра не должна этому препятствовать. После того как ты выверено спустя 1000 попыток вылетел на магните, или когда притяжкой допрыгал до какой-то высоты, или когда куб+прыжок закидываешь яблоко, а тебя в первый, второй и третий раз встречает прозрачная стена, уже гореть начинает. Игра наоборот должна поощрять нестандартный подход. Можно было того же мима вставить или игровыми условностями ограничить (борт песочницы сделать из камня) доступ к таким вещать. Но разработчики сделали прозрачный стены (читай: нам лень думать, у нас горят сроки, мы на вас насрали). Второй минус, это линейность прохождения поиска трофеев. Игра в какой-то момент превратилась "найди куда телепортировался этот долб@eб"

средне: с самого начала игра говорит "видишь тут фиолетовый постамент для куба? не трогай, это для исследования". Я когда получил куб и думать забыл что там раз 20 уже это место встречалось и по новой всё искал. Карта в этом никак не помогает, а жаль. Было бы не плохо добавить аналог "Счастье" из первой части после прохождения всей игры/сбора всех трофеев, чтобы легче было сундуки искать и собирать

из кеков: разбивание камней это 1в1 Chaos Destruction анрила

Coming from supraland I had some pleasant surprises, the enemies don't respawn and are less common. the areas remains thematic and while it felt I get the powers faster the trackback and areas are less frustrating.

so far the game plays more or less like supraland, if you like the first game you will enjoy this one too, nothing much to say honestly. runs fine, no bugs and the dialogues/characters are interesting as usual!

Recommandé
18.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 juin 2023
EMOS BEWARE!
When you play this game the deep seated emptiness which defines you will disappear. It has the sandbox charm of the first game with a new underground look. The combat has massively improved and you can use your magnet to fly around enemies like Attack on Titan. Arenas were a perfect addition that make the game more replayable. When I beat the campaign I saw I had only about 25% completion. Some of the post game puzzles made me feel brick dumb it felt so good when I solved them. You'll throw out your eye shadow before reaching the second area.

its fun
 
Edgard
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
17.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 juin 2023
Fun: ★★★★★★★★★★ (10/10)
Thanks to the one specific youtube channel from Croatia, i was introduced to the Supraland games. I got the free Supraland on another launcher, completed it 100% and i fell in love. I had so much fun with the first Supraland, that i decided to buy another copy of Supraland & Supraland Crash on Steam and i am planning to complete the game again. Regarding Supraland Six Inches Under, it is the worthy successor of the original and i had a lot of fun playing this game and interacting with cute characters.

Gameplay: ★★★★★★★★★☆ (9/10)
Controls are fluid, responsive and perfected with love. Sometimes, the player won't double jump or jump at all, or it will slide on the rock and similar, but those are pretty small things that will mostly not affect your experience.

Graphics: ★★★★★★★★★★ (10/10)
Love the art style. Not realistic, and if you ask me, the game would lost its charm if it had realistic graphics. That's why i am concerned about Supraworld, but we'll see.

Optimization: ★★★★★★★★☆☆ (8/10)
Runs way better than the original Supraland, but i have the feeling that optimization wasn't a top priority during development. There should be more graphics settings available in the options menu, if you ask me.

Price: ★★★★★★★★★☆ (9/10)
I bought the game when it was on the sale, it was a great price. Excellent offer.

Soundtrack: ★★★★★★★★★★ (10/10)
Please release the soundtrack on YouTube, my favourite OST is Bank Heist Theme, or whatever you call the track that plays when you're doing the bank puzzle. Other tracks are also excellent.

Story: ★★★★★★★☆☆☆ (7/10)
Maybe the weakest point of this game, but i suppose it's not the main focus of the game. I didn't play it for the story after all.

FINAL: ★★★★★★★★★★ (10/10) (9.00)

Overall, Supraland franchise is on my top 10 list, i kinda feel nostalgic when i am playing it. Sometimes, it can be frustrating when you don't know how to solve difficult puzzle, but i consider it as a part of the game charm, even if some puzzles are designed with less love. I want to thank developer for creating such a great, relatively polished indie game and i want to thank you, Steam User, for reading my review. I took a couple of screenshot while playing Six Inches Under, feel free to check it on my profile.
 
MrPhillips

Serega.Aleks7
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
6.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 mai 2023
Supraland is a great Metroidvania game if that's your cup of tea. It sure is mine! Supraland isn't just good for it's gameplay, it also has some great atmoshprere. Sound design is just right, soundtrack is simple but good at its job. This game somehow gives me strong wibes of Harry Potter games 1-3 - something in level-design I guess, and also of a couple of games you probably never heard of or played: Magic Turn, russian quest about a literal bee trapped inside a house, for the miniature world aesthetic; and Brave Dwarves: Creeping Shadows, for color palette and lighthearted mood.

It's rare that I launch a game and get lost in it for good 3 hours, and it's even more rare that I want to return after the initial dive. Guess I just like Metroidvanias that much, and this is a good one!

If you bought Supraland (and Crash) and loved it then just buy Six Inches Under too. It's an excellent follow-up with a decent length campaign and same mix of action/humor/silliness. самая луцшая игра
 
Gripony
172 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
25.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 mai 2023
This first paragraph is copied from my review for the first Supraland as it applies to this game as well: Must play for anyone that likes puzzles and metroidvanias. The puzzles were done really well and solving them gave a good sense of accomplishment; something a lot of AAA games really struggle with. I also love how actively the developer interacts with the community; again something I really wish other developers learned as well. The player movement is really smooth and its feels like a breeze running and jumping across the whole world.

The combat and the enemy variety improved a lot from the first game and unlike the first game where I was spamming the same attack, the same could not be done here and it made the game more interesting. Also, the enemies were not frustrating like in the first game.

The beam elasticity and the stun gun were a nice addition in this game. I did miss the stomp attack though. But one thing which was a step back from the first game was that double and triple jump were only introduced after the story and I would have LOVED to have them from close to the beginning as they make traversal very fun.

I also love that the game lets you slow down the game speed as some puzzles would have been very frustrating without it especially where you have to pull yourself with the force beam on ceilings etc (I absolutely hate that game mechanic).

My only real complaint is using the chest detector for 100% completion. I really wish it had some sort of a directional arrow as well instead of just the Audio cues as it gets really really really frustrating doing circles of the same area when you no idea where exactly to look and the constant beeping does not help at all.

Overall score: 11/10 because even with the 2-3 complaints, this and the previous game are UNIQUE and no other games come close to these masterpieces. Really looking forward to the next Supra game.
 
currentbir

0

Recommandé
14.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 mai 2023
Let me tell you, folks, this puzzle game, it's tremendous. It's absolutely fantastic, believe me. I've played a lot of puzzle games, but let me tell you, this one is something else. It's a game-changer, okay?

First of all, the puzzles in this game, they're incredible. I mean, nobody does puzzles like this. You have to use your brain, your big beautiful brain, to solve them. It's like a mental workout, but fun, very fun. I guarantee you, nobody does puzzles like this. It's genius, pure genius.

And the difficulty, folks, it's off the charts. This game will challenge you like you've never been challenged before. It's like a test, a test of your intelligence, and let me tell you, I aced it. But even if you struggle a bit, it's okay because the satisfaction you get when you solve a puzzle, it's tremendous. You feel like a winner, a real winner.

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante

Recommandé
11.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 avril 2023
整体真的体验很新奇，从未玩过这么有趣的类银河恶魔城游戏。
起初以为是一款不起眼的劣质小游戏，这奇怪的跳跃感，这潦草的人物设计...
当我玩了一段时间后发现，有mc的镐子和矿石，妥妥的致敬，还有不少笑料，非常有趣，也许上面的劣质效果其实就是特色内容呢。还有解谜设计看似很潦草，其实越玩越上头，还挺烧脑的。“你已经获得探索的所有能力了，只是你还不够聪明！”每次看到类似的话都让我哭笑不得。
最后希望制作人能继续创造新的有趣作品：3

MASTER !
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
56.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 mars 2023
Another beautiful and clever Supra game! Characters/plot not as lovable as the first one in the series but still tons of fun. Very difficult to play on an old potato without lowering settings as far down as they can go. Only gripe about this series is how the controls get supremely spazzy during challenge levels- They work nice and smooth until there's a ticking clock or a narrow path to cross and then they go all floppy and stupid. Thing is, Supra games are entirely addicting so when you finally beat one of these unnecessarily difficult parts, it's a good feeling... til it goes back to being dumb again... and then it's great again... and then...

Évaluation publiée le 27 mars 2023
LOVE IT! Quite a few differences from the original (most notably damage and health numbers are both smaller), the one thing I wish was reintroduced that wasn't was the coin magnet (I swear I lost a few coins to lava). If you get to 100% chests etc but are still missing one upgrade, there's a certain act of pyromania that must be performed and atoned for to get a free-floating upgrade that may be what you're missing.
Purchased in a Humble Bundle.

For some of the area's its a bit vague on what to do and sometimes I missed the radio saying I can't do a puzzle =(.

I though I was done with the game, but apperently I had 40% done while finishing the storyline, so that is very nice!!

Non recommandé
25.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 mars 2023
Une réalisation bien en dessous du jeu original.
Le jeu est bien plus court je l'ai finit en 6h en prenant mon temps. Ramasser tous les coffres et trophés prendra plus de temps mais ça devient ennuyeux.
On perd la véritable sensation de liberté dans cet optu vus qu'il se passe sous terre on est limité par des couloirs et les mondes ne sont pas bien dévellopé.
C'est une expérience sympas mais que je ne recommande pas car facultative et décevante
 
shayologo
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
19.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 mars 2023
This game is superb. For any fan of platforming, puzzle solving, and/or a nagging desire to be a completionist, you can't get much better than this.

The world is colorful and varied in design, the puzzles are interesting and fun to solve (in a game with so many puzzles, the fact that I only disliked two of them is excellent), the music—just like the first game—is great and never gets annoying, and the movement and abilities seem to be perfected, or at least feel smoother and more natural, than the first game (which I also loved and 100%ed, so don't get the wrong idea). And while the combat is simpler in this game, it's also way more fun to engage in, i.e. enemies don't feel like a chore to deal with until you can destroy their spawn points.

Overall a fantastic experience worth engaging in. The current 97% positive reviews are well-warranted.
 
Celly
202 produits enregistrés
3
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
35.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 mars 2023
Tanto como el primero, excelente juego. No hay mucho mas que decir, me gusto.
Aunque el primero tiene mas de novedad, el segundo como que le falto algo mas de historia pero no hace el peso como para considerarlo inferior al primero.

Solo una cosa me saco, no pude encontrar un cofre... y no pude conseguir el ultimo logro que me faltaba. Me recorrí todo el juego, todos los escenarios, volví al inicio y me llegue al final nuevamente. Hasta termine viendo vídeos sobre las ubicaciones de los cofres. Rastrille cada centímetro (literalmente teniendo en cuenta lo grande que es el mapa xD), y no pude encontrarlo.
Me dio una bronca barbara! >:(
No se si habrá sido un bug q me paso a mi... pero bueno, me quedo volverlo a iniciar pero me dio pereza, sobre todo por el tiempo invertido en buscar todos los logros y por un cofre no pude conseguirlos. Termine desinstalandolo... quizás en un futuro vuelva, cuando me olvide de lo que me paso jajaja :P
Así todo excelente juego!
 
SoulHunter666

Évaluation publiée le 28 février 2023
If you liked the first supraland, you'll like this. Game itself felt shorter, hunting for chests was easier too I guess.
Timeline wise, this happens at the start/during the Crash DLC. Really liked all the references to the first supraland+dlc in the game. Especially all the Crash ones. You kinda interact with the Red Prince a few times, the same way he interacts with you in Crash. You know that kitted out blue dude you meet here and there? That's YOU in this game.
 
Eleos
299 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
18.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 février 2023
Fun puzzle game, but some solutions are not obvious (to me personally) since the game isn't advertised as a physics puzzle game (you have to try stuff, some items have more than one use). I liked it overall, but at some points I was losing my patience (probably the problem is with me and not the game). I loved how one thing you are "not supposed to have" still works (and show you text "you're not supposed to have this").

The game isn't very long, took me less than 20 hours to 100% (I did use a guide for a few last % points, specifically, 10 hidden trophies). Overall, it's good, although if I had to choose between Supraland SIU and Supraland, I'd pick Supraland (original game). I like oven world design more, especially with its end-game bonuses that break some puzzles (IMO, it's much more fun this way, at least post-credits). Still, if you played Supraland and want more, this is a good game.

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
24.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 février 2023
Supraland Six Inches Under - smaller and more compact than the original, yet I found it much more accessible. Perhaps slightly odd in how the end game state comes up so soon, with fully over half the game left as voluntary "100%" completion but then that exploration and acquiring new abilities is part of the true fun of these game types. Recommended for all who love metroidvania-likes and fun, light hearted adventures with some real head scratching puzzles. Looking forward to Supraworld!
 
bobsshadow
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
16.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 février 2023
Supraland SIU is a really good exploration/puzzle game.
Everything from the first game is here: humor, well-crafted world and some complex puzzles that will leave you scratching your head until you find out a solution that either make you feel like you're a genius or dumb as hell for not figuring it out in 10 seconds.
But, though it does everything the first Supraland did, it does all this quite less well. The story is not as engaging, the world feels smaller, the puzzles aren't as fun and their complexity doesn't progress as organicaly.
Still a good game, but the 1st Supraland was just too perfect to be easily matched by its sequel(s).
 
The Passenger
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
8.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 février 2023
Das Spiel hat gut angefangen, typisch Supraland und mich bis zu einem bestimmten Punkt gut unterhalten. Dann kam ein längerer Frustmoment. Es gibt zwar weniger Kämpfe, dafür "Arenen". In einer davon bin ich mangels gefundener Upgrades lange nicht weiter gekommen, da einige Gegner gerade am Anfang one hit kills verteilen.

Durchbeißen lohnt sich aber. Das Spiel ist eine tolle Stand-Alone Erweiterung mit viel Humor, Anspielungen auf vorher und kreativen Achievements.

Gibt es viel zu entdecken? Absolut. Wenn selbst das Achievement vor den Credits ankündigt, man habe bisher vielleicht 50% gesehen, kann man sich auf viele Geheimnisse vorbereiten.

Ich hoffe auf ein Wiedersehen vom blauen Klempner, roten Prinzen und weißen Bürgermeister in Supraworld. 👍

Havent played Supraland game before, but this one is pretty fun. There are a few jokes that land, which is surprising in this day and age. It is simply puzzle platformer where you have to collect as much coins as possible hidden around the world, and that world is very nicely done. Laser that connects two wooden structures can be implemented better, sometimes it is hard to notice which surface can be connected.

urszula.szczyglowska
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
24.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 février 2023
I played this a whole bunch after enjoying Supraland, taking a break, and coming back for more. It's just more good stuff as far as I'm concerned, with the graphics improved quite a bit.

I think they also moved the combat in an interesting direction, with items being able to interact with enemies in different ways. The combat is still simple and not the main focus of the game, but it could be quite cool in Supraworld if they take some of these ideas further and add some new ones.

As a bonus, I got soft-locked because I went out of bounds, and I made a post on the steam community page asking if there's a trick to get out. One of the devs actually chimed in and let me know that the game automatically backs up your saves, so that was a nice surprise.

Si te gusto el primer juego y el DLC pero les faltaba algo, este esta mucho mejor construido, en mi opinión. Menos combates o no tan molestos, un mapa, no te pierdes tanto o no sabes que hacer. Es mucho mas fluido para mi.
 
socramazibi
538 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
16.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 22 janvier 2023
本作作为Supraland的1.5续作的表现不错，增加了不少新的道具和玩法，旧的道具有了新的用法，各种隐藏要素也非常讨喜，非常佩服制作者藏宝箱的能力，想要全收集真得花上不少时间在一些意想不到的地方寻找。本作相比原作更加重视了闯关和解密，将战斗变得更加简单了。通关了主线之后还有两个探索区域，难度不小但也很有趣，游玩时很轻松，很适合作为完成一部3A大作之后的休闲解压时间，我之前也玩过了原作和DLC,算是半个粉丝吧，个人评分可以给到7/10。
 
Sijhaill
460 produits enregistrés
0
